name: TC-023: User back from editor to page listing screen by click Back button in the Editor header when page is saved manually

steps.name: Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Wait for the page listing to be loaded
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create blank page']
Create a new PAGE page from template
Click on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: page-template

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: page-template

steps.name: Verify page title is Select page template

attachments.name: ==> The Text is: Select page template

steps.name: Wait for the page to be loaded
Switch to Frame by Name: pf-sandbox
Switch to Frame by Name: app-iframe
Get value of parameter id from URL
Change the page title to Test PAGE Mon May 27 11:33:36 ICT 2024
Click on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

steps.name: Clear and Fill text on element not reachable by keyboard
Click on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

steps.name: Set text on text box and press key

attachments.name: Clear and Fill Test PAGE Mon May 27 11:33:36 ICT 2024 on By.id: editor-header-bar--page-title

steps.name: Click on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--save-page-btn

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--save-page-btn

steps.name: Verify text Save page of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name:
==> The Text is: Save page
Once saved, the page will be ready for preview.
Please note that:
After saving, you have to publish the page to make it go live.
Page preview might differ from the live page due to your theme styling.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Save

==> The Text is: Save page
Once saved, the page will be ready for preview.
Please note that:
After saving, you have to publish the page to make it go live.
Page preview might differ from the live page due to your theme styling.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Save
Verify text of an element [Contains] : true

steps.name: Verify element NOT present [[ChromeDriver: chrome on mac (9626aff536645de38481e1cc2f2dd7dc)] -> xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]]
Verify element visible By.xpath: //*[@id="editor-header-bar--status"]//*/span[@class="Polaris-Badge Polaris-Badge--toneSuccess"]//*[text()="Saved"] with timeout 30 second
Verify text Enable autosave? of element [Contains] By.xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]

attachments.name:
==> The Text is: Enable autosave?
Enabling autosave allows you to automatically save any changes made to the current page. Learn more
Autosaving will not create new versions in version history. To create one, you need to manually save your progress in the editor.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Enable

==> The Text is: Enable autosave?
Enabling autosave allows you to automatically save any changes made to the current page. Learn more
Autosaving will not create new versions in version history. To create one, you need to manually save your progress in the editor.
Don't remind me again
Cancel
Enable
Verify text of an element [Contains] : true

steps.name: Verify element NOT present [[ChromeDriver: chrome on mac (9626aff536645de38481e1cc2f2dd7dc)] -> xpath: //*[@id="PolarisPortalsContainer"]//*//div[@role="dialog"]/div[1]]
Click back button to exit the editor
Click on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--exit-btn

attachments.name: Clicked on the element By.id: editor-header-bar--exit-btn

Verify element visible By.xpath: //*/button/span[text()='Create from template']
